timeline.bodyText: It is added to 2.21.0, please let me know if the branch is already cut, I can move it to 2.22.0 if needed.
timeline.author: Hannah-Jiang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -67,6 +67,7 @@
     [Ensuring Python Type Safety](https://beam.apache.org/documentation/sdks/python-type-safety/)
     and an upcoming
     [blog post](https://beam.apache.org/blog/python/typing/2020/03/06/python-typing.html).
+* --direct_num_workers=0 is supported for FnApi. It will set the number of threads/subprocesses to number of cores of the machine executing the pipeline([BEAM-9443](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-9443)).

replies.bodyText: The branch is cut, please move to 2.22.0
replies.author: ibzib

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * --direct_num_workers=0 is supported for FnApi. It will set the number of threads/subprocesses to number of cores of the machine executing the pipeline([BEAM-9443](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-9443)).
          
          
            
            * --direct_num_workers=0 is supported for FnApi runner. It will set the number of threads/subprocesses to number of cores of the machine executing the pipeline([BEAM-9443](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-9443)).
timeline.author: ibzib

     [Ensuring Python Type Safety](https://beam.apache.org/documentation/sdks/python-type-safety/)
     and an upcoming
     [blog post](https://beam.apache.org/blog/python/typing/2020/03/06/python-typing.html).
+* --direct_num_workers=0 is supported for FnApi. It will set the number of threads/subprocesses to number of cores of the machine executing the pipeline([BEAM-9443](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-9443)).

timeline.bodyText: Can you please remove these placeholders? ie keep the section headers but remove "feature X..."
timeline.author: ibzib
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -47,6 +47,33 @@
 * Fixed X (Java/Python) ([BEAM-X](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-X)).
 -->
 
+# [2.22.0] - Unreleased
+
+## Highlights
+
+* New highly anticipated feature X added to Python SDK ([BEAM-X](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-X)).

replies.bodyText: I don't see problems here. It's good to provide a sample when there is no entry. Contributors will overwrite the placeholder when they add something new.
replies.author: Hannah-Jiang
